title: Ashley Graham shows off her bare bump during dancing break at the gym
text:
She's expecting her first child.

And by the looks of Ashley Graham's bump, it won't be much longer until she's a mother.

The actress, 31, showcased her bare bump while taking a dancing break at the gym on Tuesday.

Oh baby indeed! By the looks of Ashley Graham's bump on Tuesday, it won't be much longer until she's a mother

Ashley's bump was put on full display as she tied her black T-shirt just above her torso.

The model was absolutely glowing as she grooved around the gym, snapping her fingers while busting a move.

Ashley was wearing a black 'Fearless' T-shirt, leggings, and wore her hair slicked up into a high bun.

Ashley's trainer Kira Stokes documented the mom-to-be's workout routine on her Instagram account, proving the model has not let pregnancy stop her from breaking a sweat.

I like to move it! Graham busted out a few moves during a break from her workout

She's got rhythm! The model was having a grand old time working it at the gym

Not only has she been continuing with her workout, but she has even launched a new fitness series entitled Thank Bod.

Ashley debuted the new YouTube series on Monday, posting a video to her Instagram account which introduced the new show.

'We all have complicated relationships with our bodies, as mine has been changing in some really new, interesting ways,' Ashley said in the video, referencing her pregnancy.

Baby makes three: Ashley is expecting a child with her husband of nine years, Justin Ervin

Let's do this! The star has not let pregnancy slow down her workouts

Ashley is expecting a child with her husband of nine years, Justin Ervin.

The couple announced the pregnancy on Instagram back in August, with Ashley writing on her account: 'Nine years ago today, I married the love of my life. It has been the best journey with my favorite person in the world!

'Today, we are feeling so blessed, grateful and excited to celebrate with our GROWING FAMILY! Happy anniversary, @mrjustinervin ❤️ Life is about to get even better.'

Bump in the night: Graham gazed towards her bare bump as her trainer documented the dance break

Exercise with Ashley! Graham introduced her new workout series, Thank Bod, on Instagram
description: The actress, 31, showcased her bare bump while taking a dancing break at the gym on Tuesday. Ashley's bump was put on full display as she tied her black T-shirt above her torso.
